MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA15 postcode area of Greenock. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.56pm. Our next available engineer will attend site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7:00pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:12pm on Wednesday, 14 October 2020
